content: is there a way to walk the lakefile and extract out a list of target names?

Unfortunately, there is not CLI command for this yet. This would make a good feature request (RFC) to report in the Lean issues. This request is similar to lean4#2708, but it I think it is sufficiently different to warrant a searate issue (this is about command to get a listing; that is a bout the providing guidance on bare lake exe).
